import React from 'react' export default function ProductList() { const products = [ { id: 1, name: 'Basic Tee', href: '#', imageSrc: 'https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/product-page-01-related-product-01.jpg', imageAlt: "Front of men's Basic Tee in black.", price: '$35', color: 'Black', }, { id: 2, name: 'Basic Tee', href: '#', imageSrc: 'https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/product-page-01-related-product-01.jpg', imageAlt: "Front of men's Basic Tee in black.", price: '$35', color: 'Black', }, { id: 3, name: 'Basic Tee', href: '#', imageSrc: 'https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/product-page-01-related-product-01.jpg', imageAlt: "Front of men's Basic Tee in black.", price: '$35', color: 'Black', }, { id: 1, name: 'Basic Tee', href: '#', imageSrc: 'https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/product-page-01-related-product-01.jpg', imageAlt: "Front of men's Basic Tee in black.", price: '$35', color: 'Black', }, // More products... ] return (

Customers also purchased

{products.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.color}

{product.price}

))}
) };
